Title: Polynomial ring $R[X] $ has zero Jacobson radical, for $R$ a domain
Content: Let $R$ be a commutative domain. Prove that the Jacobson radical of $R[X]$, i.e. the intersection of all maximal ideals, is the zero ideal. Thank you.
